page.title: 14CLUBS
page.content: {Whitchurch has about a hundred clubs which cater for interests ranging from sports,to singing and beekeeping.Here are some examples:Guides,Flower Club, Senior Citizens Club,Young Farmers, Angling Society,Photographic Society, Tennis Club,British Legion and Air Training Corps.The{Civic Centre}is an important venue for many clubs but other places like Centre North East are also used.Sports' clubs such as the cricket club on Heath Road have their own premises.Some clubs meet weekly, others monthly.The Swimming Club,for instance,meets every Wednesday evening,whilst the Townswomen's Guild meet on the second Tuesday of each month from 7.15pm.to 10pm.at the Bargate Rooms.Memberships vary but some clubs have over 50 members.
